Description: For October 1! A sensationally renovated two bed in Brighton Center. Heat and hot water included! Built in air conditioning and a location right across the street from the new Boston Landing commuter rail stop. Laundry is on site, there's a dishwasher for your convenience and tons of natural light This place is an absolute steal. No pets allowed. One month broker fee.
